thread.title: 30 Atlanta Falcons fans injured at Georgia Dome
thread.title_full: 30 Atlanta Falcons fans injured at Georgia Dome | www.ajc.com

author: Breaking News Staff
title: 30 Atlanta Falcons fans injured at Georgia Dome
text:
Dozens of Atlanta Falcons fans were injured Sunday after the team’s overtime win over the Washington Redskins .
“After the conclusion of the Atlanta Falcons game on Sunday,” Georgia Dome spokesman Jason Kirksey said Tuesday, “a mishap occurred with an escalator at Upper Gate D inside the Georgia Dome causing several fans to suffer injuries.”
In a statement to Channel 2 Action News, Kirksey said about 30 fans were treated by medical personnel for minor injuries.
Jason Getz / AJC January 20, 2013 - Atlanta, Ga: Atlanta Falcons players run out of the tunnel before their game against the San Francisco 49ers in the NFC Championship game at the Georgia Dome Sunday afternoon in Atlanta, Ga., January 20, 2013. JASON GETZ / JGETZ@AJC.COM The incident remains under investigation.
